text: @NYGovCuomo Stop Telling People What to do..Reports from CDC have already Became Public More than half of Covid Deaths are Not from Covid-19 itself. It was Forced to use that to Brainwash & Scare People into you Politicians Submissions..You Guys are Trying to Control Humanity & Will FAIL 🤔
